data.subject: Winter Wonderland
data.lyric:
Sleigh bells ring
 Are you listening
 In the lane
 Snow is glistening
 A beautiful sight
 We're happ

data.subject: Love Me Now
data.lyric:
Pulling me further
 Further than I've been before
 Making me stronger
 Shaking me right to the core

data.subject: I Know Better
data.lyric:
They say sing what you know
 But I've sung what they want
 Some folks do what they're told
 But baby

data.subject: Someday (From `The August Rush` Soundtrack)
data.lyric:
As days go by
 and fade to nights
 I still question
 why you left
 I wonder how
 it didn't work out
